sentences.en: A projecting land mass; a promontory.
sentences.cn: 岬,海角一大块凸出的陆地; 海角.

sentences.en: A promontory at the northwest extremitythe scottish mainland.
sentences.cn: 拉斯角苏格兰大陆西北端的海角.

sentences.en: A stark , rocky promontory towered over a stand of majestic pines.
sentences.cn: 一片悬崖高耸在一片巍巍的松树之上.

sentences.en: A tapering extension of land projecting into water; a peninsula, cape, or promontory.
sentences.cn: 角,岬,半岛:伸入水中的一块逐渐变得尖细的陆地; 半岛 、 角或岬.

sentences.en: Coastal winds are also causing problems with a fire at Wilsons Promontory.
sentences.cn: 沿海风力也造成问题发生火灾,威尔逊普瑞蒙特瑞.

sentences.en: On the map that promontory looks like a nose, naughtily turned up.
sentences.cn: 从地图上看,那个海角就像一只调皮地起来的鼻子.

sentences.en: This gold deposit is located on the west of Huaxiongtai promontory and of Machaoying fracture zone.
sentences.cn: 九丈沟金矿床矿区位于华熊台隆西缘,马超营断裂带北侧.

trans.tran_en: a long narrow piece of land which sticks out into the sea
